name: Tom Gone
description:
This is a first iteration of a level of my first game (Vertical slice), there are still many things to improve and include in.

  • Inspired by AfterBurner and Raptor Call of the Shadows.
  • Tom Gone is about a mercenary who joins the planetary defence against aliens.
  • Takes place in both terrestrial and space locations.
  • Different enemy types and equipment.
  • Rewards.
  • Abilities.
  • Todo:

Mobile Controls

EnergySystem

Improve visual quality

Others

  • In Progress:

Story

GamePad Controls

Test, Game balancing
